website_summaries.verdict: Not only is the Aliph Jawbone Icon attractive and affordable with great call quality, but it is also highly customizable with advanced features that make it the most innovative Bluetooth headset we've seen to date.
pros: The Aliph Jawbone Icon comes in a variety of beautiful jewellike designs
it has a dedicated on/off switch
and it comes with several ear-fit options.
It has many advanced features, including an iPhone battery meter, and is highly customizable with certain Audio and Dial "apps" via Jawbone's own MyTalk Web site.
It has amazing sound quality and excellent canceling of wind noise
cons: The Aliph Jawbone Icon doesn't have a manual volume rocker and the ear fit could be a bit more comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Small & discreet, nice performance and design.
customer_reviews.text: This is the previous generation of Jawbone Bluetooth headset. I think the most current one - by the time of this writing - is called Era. I however, preferred this one's design. It's smaller and very discreet. I have used it with two different iPhones (4 & 5), and it works pretty well. The noise assassin feature is very effective. People on the other side of the line have told me they can't tell I'm on a Bluetooth headset, and this is while having moderate surrounding noise (I haven't tried with heavy/intense noise, although in those circumstances I wouldn't even bother talking on the phone). Mine was a refurbished unit, but it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: For my wife who always take care young boy. freedom for her hands.
customer_reviews.text: To. whom take care young child(2+ yrs) This is the one for you. I bought this for my wife who was really hard to answer her cellphone. indoor/outdoor doesn't matter. while she makes baby sleep, she avoid any phone calls. but with this, she is free to answer. even she is whispering over this, I can hear clearly. and even she is on outside with baby playground(YOU KNOW HOW THEY PLAY. AND LOUDLY.) this product's noise cancellation work great. it gets rid of all screams. Wait... stop read review. go get it. you will love it. go get this one. if price is under $30, just get this for freedom.
customer_reviews.author: Borae Cho

customer_reviews.title: Best ear bud I have t used
customer_reviews.text: I have tried at least half a dozen different telephone ear pieces over the years sense they came on the market (I am 81) I was a computer programmer before I retired so have worked and lived with electronics sense 1955. All the other devices felt loose and flopped around or actually fell off, the Jawbone stays in place, provides excellent audio both transmitted and received. I couldn't be more satisfied with my purchase. The flexibility of the answer, hang-up and redial work very well and are easy to learn and use.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed although great features set
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back due to consistent and persistent complaints of "your breaking up I can't hear you" the Jawbone has great features that you can add which is really cool. However that is all trumped if the person on the other end cannot make your voice out, I use a Bluetooth for business and have not yet over the past several years have been able to find one that is truly fantastic and I have tried them all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: The Mercedes of the bluetooth headsets
customer_reviews.text: I have owned like 10 different models from numerous brands. But this is the one to go. Excellent customer support but only if you bought it from an authorized dealer of course. (Iphone users beware that sometimes you may need to reconnect the headset to correct sound issues. This happens very rarely. In contrast to other brands believe me this will not be an issue on a daily use basis.)
customer_reviews.author: ORKUN

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I received the item on time, however the item came in a plastic bag with the charger and headset. but no box or accessories. I was expecting the item to be complete. You should note online that you don't have it complete so people can know what they are buying. Oh i almost forgot that the battery life of the unit only charges to 3/4 of the full range, so this item is also defective. I don't have time to ship it back so i am biting the bullet on this one. To anyone buying this item, i suggest you look else where, unless you prefer defective / incomplete items.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: After my first Icon went through a cycle in the washing machine, I needed a new headset. Because I loved my first Icon was happy to see this one at such a good price. This Icon works just as well as the last one. No, it doesn't come with the box but it comes with everything inside the box and that is all that really matters. The one thing you should do after receiving this is to download the latest software. It is definitely not delivered with the latest.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great when they work. AWESOME noise cancellation! Unfortunately, they don't work for long. I quit after three .
customer_reviews.author: David Shanahn

customer_reviews.title: The noise canceling technology on this headset is the best. All my friends and family say the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: The noise canceling technology on this headset is the best. All my friends and family say the sound quality is clear with no feedback or background noise. Considering the headaches I get from my friend's cheap blutooths, the icon is top notch. I also have a blueant q2 which has way more opinions for voice recognition but the icon has superior sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: john j

customer_reviews.title: Overall GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: This little headset is pretty amazing! Good range, short charge time, and the best voice recognition software I've seen in a Bluetooth thus far. Rated 4 stars only because I have a little difficulty fitting the headset into my ear. The included rubber attachments vary in size too much; the biggest is a little too big, the next size down too small. Very seldom do you get the perfect fit. I can deal with that though- I talk on this piece 3-5 hours a day and nobody can tell I'm even using it.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent handset
customer_reviews.text: Very good handset. My wife has Jabra Stone (the first one). I took her handset and used it for 2 days. Now I have the Jawbone Icon (by friend suggestion). They are incomparable! The Icon is much better, very good and clear sound. I can use it while driving with the window opened and the other side can hear me very clear, actually even better than without the handset (I have iphone 4). Moreover, the battery notification is very useful! As a conclusion, I would say the this: let me go back in time, and I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Leonid

customer_reviews.title: It's OK...
customer_reviews.text: Not great when it comes to wind noise and the other party does mention it doesn't sound clear when I'm driving in my truck. For the price and just to use it in the office so you can write/type/use phone while on the phone, it'll work. anything else, I'd say find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ling Ling

customer_reviews.title: decent blue tooth for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am using this with a HTC Radar smartphone. It has a tendency to lose the connection which requires me to turn it off and then it will pair up again. Once paired it works great. Battery life is excellent even with using it quite a bit. Only need to recharge every two-three days depending on use. But for $35.00 how can you wrong? I would buy another one even with the with the connectivity issue.
customer_reviews.author: harp schlepper

customer_reviews.title: worst ear piece
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst ear piece. I have had some versions that were really good. This one sucks.. Don't buy this kind of stuff on Amazon unless you have the exact model # and serial code. Even then I got a piece of garbage. It was tinny sounding and my family couldn't hear me through the noise it echoed... etc.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT Work
customer_reviews.text: The sound canceling technology works great - It cancels out any sound from your voice, cheek, or jawbone. If you want to have a conversation, don't bother the other person can't hear you. I looked on line for any suggestions, I made sure i was shaven just in case that was a problem. Tried different ear pieces with no success. The earpieces held it in place and against my cheek, but what good is that if it doesn't work. The Jawbone i purchased is only good for listening to music, and pretty good sound for what it is. (to bad its only in one ear)
customer_reviews.author: brent martens

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Had one, used it till the battery finally stopped being able to hold a charge, and ordered another. Easy to use, stays in my ear pretty well. Comfortable in one ear for about 2 hours, then I switch it. Don't care about music streaming, but it does that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Farley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Damn Decent in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother-in-law to use with a watch-banded iPod Nano Touch. This far exceeded my expectations. The sound isn't muted, tin-y, or weak like one would expect out of a mono-speaker bluetooth set designed primarily for taking calls. Obviously you'd get better sound out of dedicated music headsets, but this is definitely one to go for if you're looking for a low-cost option for both music listening and phone calls. I knock one star off this thing because the A2DP doesn't work until you update it from Jawbone's website, and the lack of simulcast for A2DP devices is disappointing (You have to go more expensive for that!).
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Can Always trust a Jawbone for Quality
customer_reviews.text: I almost wear it all day and sometimes my ear gets sore. Battery stays charged. i like the simple. Functional, durable, good sound quality. I use it a lot outside and even in the wind, good sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great performance for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this Jawbone device to catch up on telephone calls for 1.5 hours day traveling too and from work. Great sound and exceptional battery life. Great new apps for android devices. If you are looking for a blue tooth device for your phone, this one is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: g4mek1ng

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sound
customer_reviews.text: My second one. The first went through the washing machine in my pocket. Works very well. Light and convenient to use. Pretty good sound.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Aliph Jawbone Icon Hero Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great product - this is probably the best option for full hands free operations. Been using Jawbone products for years both with a Blackberry and the newer IPhone 5. Noise canceling feature is ideal when driving or working in noisy areas.
customer_reviews.author: Bret M. Duff

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Yes. I think that this is a refurbished product, but at the price it is great. I have not had one stop working yet. I have bought a few now, since I seem to always loose them. They work great and at half the price of new you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: CJR

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper bulk price doesn't mean it's as good as bubbled packed one
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand and model at full price from Verizon store. Decided to get a spare one here but it didn't work. Ordered another and that didn't work either. Cheaper price doesn't mean it's going to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had a number of those. (one was washed, two were lost) Sounds very good, fits well. I loved it until it stopped working. Can happen with any electronic device. Not big deal. Ordering another one. I wonder, how it compares to Bose sound- wise.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: don't believe the hype!!
customer_reviews.text: Was quite disappointed! I have had several bluetooths < This one would recieve a third place vote ! 1 Jabra 2 motorola 3 Jawbone Icon Hero and #4 Plantronic !! This Jawbone is very uncomfortable on my ear , falls out of my ear , sound quality is sub par! Was glad that I found my Jabra that I had misplaced ! Now using it and this Jawbone is back in my drawer for emergency purpose only !!!
customer_reviews.author: Buffalosouljah

customer_reviews.title: The Icon is no longer supported by Jawbone
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product. Jawbone no longer supports or provides updates, including changing the voice, for the Icon headset.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price, with a few minor annnoyances.
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality. The noise cancellation feature seems to work quite well. This is also the first Bluetooth headset that will work hands-free with my Android Samsung Galaxy S2. I also like the fact that Jawbone is actively developing apps for this device, although some of the apps are unstable. I have a few minor complaints. The biggest is that I sometimes have trouble keeping a snug fit on my ear. Also, the earpiece frequently pops off when I take it off. That is why I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bluetooth I've had that the people I am talking to can't tell I'm on bluetooth - it sounds good to them. But they sound a little tinny to me. I don't really care as long as my business friends can hear me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Pw Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone ICON
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on the item is the best of three Jawbones I have had. Battery life is great and it's super lightweight. I got a great deal on this one and with free two day shipping it's unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: 04Blackram

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone fails to stay paired
customer_reviews.text: Have been a jawbone user for a long time. Lost my previous icon complete with custom moulded ear piece (highly recommended). Replaced it with what is touted as new unit but very disappointed. It will not stay paired with iPhone. Have tried all the usual and jawbone recommended solutions to no avail. Am returning as hopefully this one is defective.
customer_reviews.author: etrippe

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent blue tooth device. I am definitely not a blue tooth kinda guy but I bought this specifically for a trip where I knew I would be on the phone a lot and the battery life is great!
customer_reviews.author: Davin Sampietro

customer_reviews.title: I own two of these I like them so much
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these I like them so much. Works great with Galaxy S3 and S5 thus far.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: after 3 years still rocking
customer_reviews.text: have used on iphone, infuse, galaxy and is the best quality I have ever had. Easy to link cancels out ambient noise and receiving party can never tell I'm on blue tooth
customer_reviews.author: ice

customer_reviews.title: Mrsneedabetterhook
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bluetooth for my husband and this bluetooth is one of the best headsets on the market. I would have given it five stars but the ear hook could not snap onto the headset because the connector was too big. So I ordered some more hooksto see it they will work; because although it is a great product buy it is useless if my husband loses it because it doesnt fit securely. My husband put some eletrical tape around to make it fit until the new hooks arrive. Still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: mawhittley

customer_reviews.title: Duped...
customer_reviews.text: The site said it was a new item in bulk packaging. Upon synching with my computer, there were other profies and phones on the device Additionally, it did not function properly.
customer_reviews.author: Comaaz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not come w/charger, used one from an old jawbone ear piece, but would not charge. Completely inoperative.RETURNED JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: Husband gives it 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for under a week and absolutely loves it. No problems what so ever. I am planning on ordering one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta parent

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone headset
customer_reviews.text: This is an great bluetooth headset. It plays music, and can connect to two devices at once which is great for anyone who has both a work and personal phone. Both can be connected at once and take calls from either as calls come in. This option I find most helpful. The price was rock botton for this great device.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iPhone 4
customer_reviews.text: I could never get the headset to connect to my iPhone 4. I tried multiple times after fully charging the headset, power cycled my phone a bunch of times, turned bluetooth on and off on the phone, turned the headset on and off - nothing worked. Also, the medium sized earbud was missing, I got one small and 2 large ones. The headset was promptly returned for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysLearning

customer_reviews.title: Bought2 just bought 2more
customer_reviews.text: Wow I had previous version of the Jawbone and this one is much better and 1/4 the price. Very fast shipping and product is fantastic. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: justmeinputting

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance, while it worked
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this product. There are three reasons. 1) After about a month, it has proven to be defective. If I am in conversation, the other party hears, at best, every other word. 2) Before that problem began, it demonstrated limited battery life, poor voice transmission and poor ear fit. 3) I was provided with no ability to contact customer service. I'm moving on.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Esserman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: After losing a good bluetooth headset, this one fit the bill in more ways than one. The voice customiztion is a nice feature. I do wish the volume could be increaded just a little more.
customer_reviews.author: C Wright

customer_reviews.title: works fine. After a year or two it's still my ...
customer_reviews.text: works fine. After a year or two it's still my go-to bluetooth device.
customer_reviews.author: Jay from Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: works flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly, although I've never been able to get my ear to retain it as securely as I'd like without using an over-the-ear hook.
customer_reviews.author: Captain SquidBoy

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall Product
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good. None of the earpieces feel exactly right, but there is one that works the best & stays in well. The price was fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Dulwich Hill

customer_reviews.title: great choice
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research on which earpiece to get and this one has exceeded my expectations. It does USB charging which I can also do in my car. It is a bit small so it's perfect for my small ears, however some may have issues with that. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Paduano

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent.
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent pairing means this stays unused for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: You won't believe the clarity
customer_reviews.text: By far the best headset made. You won't believe the clarity coming into your ear. The noise canceling technology makes it so sharp and clear for the other person on the phone with you. No background noise and interference at all. You'd think the other person was 3 feet away from you. So light in weight I can wear it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Albritton

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone Icon The Hero Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several bluetooth headsets and this one is the WORST HANDS DOWN! Every time I attempted to speak with someone they complained about not being able to hear me! I tried different ear peices, alternating ears, I made sure it was in constant contact with my skin, it is a peice of CRAP! I'm done with Jawbone products, and VERY DISAPPOINTED! Don't waste your TIME or MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianrx7

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held up very well , doesn't always stay in ear but does a decent job blocking out sound
customer_reviews.author: bryan smith

customer_reviews.title: Good item, just wish it was a little louder
customer_reviews.text: the Aliph version is a little cheaper and maybe that it why, but the volume on this headset is not as loud as the Icon HD. Still a good headset and I use it daily. long talk time between charges and plenty of earpiece options.
customer_reviews.author: joshua griesemer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and they loved it!
customer_reviews.author: clarence sanders

customer_reviews.title: Works better than most bluetooth devices
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect but worth the money paid for it. Works well 90% of the time. Nice on off switch.I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Zalmi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted for 6 months or do then battery quit charging
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: JAWBONE ACE HERO
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL PRODUCT EXCEEDS MY EXPECTATIONS. PERFORMANCE IS GREAT AND THE BATT LIFE IS VERY LONG ALMOST 5HRS I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS UNIT TO ANYONE WHO WANTS A TRULY SUPERIOR DEVICE.
customer_reviews.author: HAMHEADBASS

customer_reviews.title: Good Service
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly. Did not work at first and had to go online to find out how to sync it to my iPhone. Be alerted to the 90 limited return policy.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sewell

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. Lost the first. Tried like 3 or 4 different brands. That was 3 returns and a give to my wife. And ordered another jawbone in the end!It's Comfortable. Good sound. 2 phone pairing. Plays my music Easy to pr. Easy to update and customize on jawbone site, grt battery. Use it all day
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gottlieb

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best bluetooth headsets i've ever used. Stay in ear, sound is great, look great. Voices are fun and caller ID really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: The sound it great but it doesn't sit well in my ear. I tried the little ear hook that came with it but the hook was sooo cheap it would come off the Jawbone. I was not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: AliceMo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jawbone headset simply because I lost my first one...the audio quality is superb, does a nice job with cancelling background noise around me and maintains about 4 hours worth of talk time on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moran

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone Icon Hero
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my sister. I bought a different name brand two months earlier from a local store. It had a lot of static. I'm proud to say that she has had no complaints at all with the Jawbone Hero.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Swanger

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: The device works great, holds charge as described by manufacturer. You can never go wrong with Jawbone ICON. Comfortable and worth a try if you've never owned one. I've always had Jawbone since their introduction to the public. Delivery was faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Pattbee

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: I ride a bicycle everyday and wanted to loose the corded headset. When I purchased this item it was because it claimed to be noise cancelling but it doesn't cancel enough. I could talk to anyone while standing still but when moving in traffic i couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Not New!!!
customer_reviews.text: The item description says "new" when it is not. Upon receiving the item I noticed scratches by the USB port on the unit. I had a difficult time getting the headset to become discoverable, and had to hold the back button while turning the power on in order for my phone to see it. After I installed the jawbone updater software, I noticed the device had been synced with two other phones. You know it's definitely not new when the headset remembers what it's been connected to. The headset works as expected I'm just terribly disappointed truthful item descriptions are not provided. I have proof the company LIED. Not how business should be done.
customer_reviews.author: cjenson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product....Except for the Ear Piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid device. Sound is great...clear...I have not, so far, received background noise or echoing complaints from people I speak to. My only complaint is the black rubber ear piece the device ships with. It sucks. Sometimes it fits great...snug...and doesn't move. Other times it falls right out of my ear.
customer_reviews.author: PJL

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on the receiving end was terrible and the callers couldn't stand talking to me while on this particular bluetooth. I have had several other Jawbone bluetooths and love them. Wound up buying a new Jawbone ERA and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: susan campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth for the money
customer_reviews.text: Better price than in the stores, same product without the fancy box. Works great so I bought a second for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: dannyg

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone Icon
customer_reviews.text: I have had very good results with jawbone products and the Icon is no exception. Very comfortable and the features work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jminion

customer_reviews.title: functional but constantly needs adjusting
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, but constantly need to be readjusted to stay in place. Ear clip does little to keep in place.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several bluetooth headsets over the last couple of years to use for my work. This is the only one that I have been able to keep on my ear while working. It also has very good sound quality and almost no background noise.
customer_reviews.author: James Martin

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone repeat purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice price, definitely met my expectations. Although the lighter color jawbones are easier to find than the all-black ones
customer_reviews.author: Ian Searle

customer_reviews.title: so nice!
customer_reviews.text: this product is so nice! i love the way it helps me stay productive by keeping me all hands free!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Stokely

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: She loves the convenience of a bluetooth headset but jawbone has been the best. Tho the battery life could use some upgrading to last much longer. It doesn't last as long as my Era...
customer_reviews.author: Francis T. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit!
customer_reviews.text: The headset works perfectly. Packaging was from an ATT store and it looked like the unit may have been returned, but it was new, clean and works like it should. Well worth the $. I recommend the seller and the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Jawbone makes amazing products, and the Icon is right up there at the top! It's features, long battery life and connectivity make it my #2 buy (#1 is the new Jawbone Prime)!
customer_reviews.author: Bart Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It will be a Chirstmas gift, love this jawbone - packaging was simply done which I was a little surprised but the packaging should not effect the product.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Good headset great price
customer_reviews.text: All jawbone products seem to work well. Ordered this one when my Era headset went dead but jawbone replaced it so this is now a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Allen

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have it out 5 minutes and it quit working. I bought this as a gift and when trying to help them set it up was very embarrassed by it tearing up so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: jawbone Icon Hero (black)
customer_reviews.text: quality product, value and shipping. vary happy with the bluetooth headset. just got to update the headset with the jawbone website and your are good to go (calls & music & navigation) def a great gift for the holiday!!
customer_reviews.author: weilin wu

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to noise canceling but the caller on the other end can actually hear the road noise from the car. Also terminates call unexpectedly. Earpiece hard to put in and out. Going back to plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Helmers

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It came in like new. It works very well and sincing was very easy. the only issue I had is I wish it came with more selection on the ear covers
customer_reviews.author: Marco Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but it does not seem to fit on the ear right
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every single one of the other ear pieces, but for some reason this thing does not sit on my ear right. It works great, but I think its just me that it does seem to fit correctly. It really does a great job of telling you how much talk time is left. I left it in my car for days and it still holds a great charge. On/Off switch is really useful, and the pairing is pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Nuqui

customer_reviews.title: Great for dual connections and noise cancelation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset after going through alot of reviews. It did a great job connecting 2 phones at the same time and was crystal clear around wind noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad Wafai

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone is great.
customer_reviews.text: Paco Rabanne.. No problems Everything came on time an satisfied with all. Paco,rabanne million dollar for men is great .
customer_reviews.author: wayne taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP USED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE, READ THE OTHER REVIEWS. The product is listed as 'new' but I received a USED item, stamped 'refurb'.....I will be returning this tomorrow. THIS VENDOR IS A SCAMMER
customer_reviews.author: scoutbag

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good on the jawbone but I don't like the fact it doesn't notify me of a text message and it doesn't fit worth a tinkers damn and falls out all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Palmer

customer_reviews.title: "Bulk" means no retail packaging
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you are considering to give it as a gift. It came in a plastic bag and although it had an OEM Jawbone AC adapter, it wasn't the right one that fits this model. I returned it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Earpiece itself is great, but not in original box and all items not included. The product only came with the charger, ear hook and only one ear bud, no replacements or ear bud to be used with ear hook.
customer_reviews.author: Soso’s Dad

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I read the review for this product and it was supposed to be very good if not one of the best. Unfortunately it stopped working after about two months. It would not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jawbone Bluetooth save ur money
customer_reviews.text: No one can here me uncomfortable. Have to hold device against different areas of face to see if other party can hear you. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Downing

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This headset is terrible can't answer phone from headset volume goes up by itself ans sometimes caller ID doesn't work would definitely like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Teaonia

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 10 hours. Then it died. Did not work any more. Do not waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: cotalva

customer_reviews.title: align jawbone bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: very dissatisfied,didn't last up to my expectation.had a hard time with noise reduction.would not recommend this Bluetooth to any one

customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit well in my ear and no way to adjust the volume

customer_reviews.text: This device was a imitation it receives no stars I wish I had a return address an I will return it

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The Aliph Jawbone Icon Hero Black It has enough earpeices and a variety of them It's upgradeable. That says it all!

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit
customer_reviews.text: I can never get it to fit and stay in my ear properly. Sometimes I am told I sound far away
customer_reviews.author: Craig Castellanos

customer_reviews.title: Aliph Jawbone
customer_reviews.text: Great value, works well. Like the around-the-ear option for situations where headset could be dislodged and lost. Cons: Would like more color choices.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: It's better than all the other Bluetooth's head sets I've had, but not Clear as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to sync to phone! Comes with a few different ear pieces so it fits comfortably in ear!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.B

product_meta.title: Aliph Jawbone Icon Hero Black Bluetooth Headset - Bulk Package
product_meta.description: The most convenient Jawbone yet with easy to operate On/Off slid switch and one simple to use button provides unparalleled convenience. Standard micro-USB charging technology, so you don't have to carry more cables! Simultaneous Multipoint means that your Jawbone ICON can manage two calls from two different phones at the same time. ICON is the world's first intelligent headset with MyTalk. MyTalk allows you to dynamically update and personalize each individual Jawbone ICON with an array of convenient apps. With custom ICON audio tones whisper important information like remaining battery life and caller ID into your ear. Finally ICON brings the best audio around with NoiseAssassin 2.5, innovative speaker design and Set it and forget it audio. Making the ICON the smallest and most comfortable Jawbone ever created
feature_bullets: Lethal NoiseAssassin eliminates noise and reduces wind
Custom ICON audio tones whisper battery life and Caller ID
Personalize your ICON with Audio & Dial Apps via Jawbone MyTalk
iPhone Battery meter displays your Jawbone ICON's remaining battery life on your iPhone
4 out of 5 people prefer talking on a Jawbone vs. a cell phone alone!
